title: Digital Life - Novel Updates
tags: Game Elements   Gamers   Male Protagonist   Virtual Reality
author: 随月听雨
description: Wang Wei, a teenager who is addicted to online games, has found the game equipment left by aliens. Due to this, his life has changed dramatically, and his world has become a huge game! Received an E-class mission from Dad to kill the chicken. Received an S-class mission from Mom to enter the Peking University.>
